node.title: Christmas Delivery Services: When Is the Last Day to Send Post Before the Holidays?
node.alt: A FedEx employee in a Santa Claus hat dropping packages off on December 24, 2020, in New York City.
node.description: The last day to post packages may be in early December for deliveries to be made by December 24 or Christmas Day.
node.content:
["The Christmas holiday season is a very busy time for mail delivery services worldwide. You'll want to make sure you get your packages sent out as early as possible to avoid Christmas presents and cards arriving after the big day.", "Here are this year's holiday shipping deadlines for different delivery services.", "
USPS
", "The U.S. Postal Service (USPS) has various shipping deadlines for deliveries within the country and abroad as well as for military deliveries. Some deadlines for international and military mail have already passed.", "The USPS advises: \"The earlier you send, the better: Don't delay, mail and ship today.\" Customers can also schedule a free package pickup for their delivery at the USPS website.", "Below are the USPS' recommended \"send-by dates\" for expected delivery before Christmas. The actual delivery date for your package may vary depending on origin, destination, post office acceptance date/time as well as other conditions, such as customs delays, the USPS says.", "Note: The shipping deadline for USPS Retail Ground Service for Alaska was on December 2.", "Note: The shipping deadline for USPS Retail Ground Service for Hawaii isn't available.", "See the USPS website for full details on shipping deadlines for all international and military mail, which vary by region and military address and range from December 6 to 21.", "See the USPS website for more information.", "", "
People queue up at a post office in Manhattan in December 2003 in New York City.
", "
UPS
", "Below are UPS' recommended \"last days to ship\" for December 24 delivery this year. Shipments to certain destinations may require an earlier shipping date, UPS says. See ups.com/ctc for more information.", "UPS Standard (from the 48 contiguous states only, so excludes Alaska and Hawaii): See ups.com/ctc for details.", "Customers are advised to see ups.com/ctc for the recommended shipping deadlines for deliveries from the U.S. to other destinations abroad.", "See the UPS website for more information.", "", "
A UPS worker wearing a mask and Santa Claus hat poses on December 24, 2020, in New York City.
", "
FedEx
", "Below are FedEx's dates for \"last days to ship\" holiday packages this year.", "FedEx says: \"December 15 is the last day to ship via FedEx Ground if you have a regular scheduled pickup or you drop off shipments at a staffed FedEx location.\"", "Transit times normally range from one to five business days within the contiguous U.S. and three to seven business days for FedEx Ground deliveries to and from Alaska and Hawaii, based on the destination ZIP code, FedEx notes.", "See the FedEx website for full details on shipping deadlines for deliveries to Canada, Mexico, Puerto Rico and destinations abroad.", "", "
A FedEx employee in a Santa Claus hat dropping packages off on December 24, 2020, in New York City.
"]
